boardgame.name: Ships
boardgame.description: Ships deals with the history of shipping, from the time of the Phoenicians to the modern era. The game is divided into three ages, marked with different ship types. The first age is that of the galley, followed by the age of the galleon, then finally the steamship age. The board combines a track showing the development of ships, similar to that in Automobile, with a map of Europe and an area representing the rest of the world._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Your turn is divided into two phases. In the first phase, you choose to either conduct commerce (such as selling goods, taxing locations or improving your warehouse) or take a card, selecting one from seven on display; the cards vary in their effects, granting money, victory points or special actions._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In the second phase, you choose whether to place a ship, move a ship, or retrieve ships/merchants. When you place a ship, you do so in either the merchant box or the warship box in one of eleven levels. A merchant allows you to place a merchant cube on the board, giving you one or two goods counters to place in your warehouse. A warship lets you take control of a location at the cost of one food goods counter._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Once all of your ships are on the board, you can either move them (paying money to advance its level and take the associated action) or retrieve it from the board so that you can place it elsewhere later. As ships are placed in a level, the cost of placing in the next level reduces _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; until finally somebody is willing to pay the cost to place in that level (which earns bonus points and possible additional income). When a ship is placed in the first galleon level, galleys become redundant; similarly, someone placing in the first steamship level makes galleons redundant. During the galleon and steamship ages, you can pay extra to move more ships, so having money in hand gives you a greater range of options and allows you to use your fleet more efficiently._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;When placing ships, you can initially place only in _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;1_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; locations, which are grouped around the eastern Mediterranean Sea. Once someone pays to move to a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;2_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; location, which are grouped around the western Mediterranean, that area opens to others, with the other areas being Northern Europe (3), the Americas (4), East Indies (5) and the Pacific (6). As soon as a new area opens, players score points for merchants and control discs in the present area, with the points earned being the same as the number of the area._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Ships includes six types of goods: food, oil, metal, wine, cloth and spices. Each has a monetary value as well as a special power. Food can be used to take control of locations, thus building an empire. Oil can be used to gain extra actions. Metal helps to advance your ships along the outer track. Wine can be converted to goods of a lower value. Cloth can be converted to victory points, while spices have the highest monetary value. You have to decide whether to cash your goods in for money or use their power._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;NOTE: this description is out-of-date._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Episode 67- Kingdom Death: Monster and Women Representations in Games
Episode 92- Barcelona: The Rose of Fire plus Gloomhaven Contest
Heavy Cardboard Episode 35 – Food Chain Magnate

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: I am offering from the SPIEL 15 the Limited Edition of Ships from Martin Wallace. The game was sold out after two days. The limited edition comes with a signature of Martin Wallace, wooden playing material and with limited number 483. The game is and shrink wrapped. It is in English language. -------------------------- Bezahlung / Payment: - Deutschland: Überweisung - EU: euro bank transfer with IBAN and BIC or PayPal. - Rest of the world: PayPal -------------------------- Versandkosten / Shipping costs: - Deutschland: Bitte vorher anfragen. - EU: Please ask before buying. - Rest of the world: please ask before buying. Info From Seller
Ships limited edition. All cards in sleeve and ressources in order box. Played once only, hence like new condition.
Subscriber edition #568 out of 1500. Includes signed sticker. Includes replacement gold coins. Please email me for shipping quote. Thanks.

English Limited Edition from Treefrog Games. Comes with a numbered special sticker and upgraded wooden components (Gold and ships). Played only once with 2 players, but not a game for us unfortunately. In excellent like new condition, no dings and dents and marks. :-) Please contact me for a shipping quote. Local pick-up is also possible: Afhalen kan in Dordrecht, Rotterdam of Rijswijk, op afspraak. Verzenden binnen NL kan met DHL, Kiala of TNT. My preffered option of payment is with bank transfer or cash with pick-up. I do NOT use PayPal, after being scammed a couple of times. I will only allow payment with PayPal as _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;sending money to friend/family_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. Please consider if you are okay with this, before purchase. If you have any questions, feel free to ask.
Limited Edition. New in Shrink. Includes the replacement gold coins. Ships to US or NYC Local pickup available.

This is the limited edition with the wooden ships. Only played once, like new, non-smoking household. I will ship worldwide, but please ask in advance how much shipping costs are. If you want to pay via Paypal, 1€ is added for Paypal fee. Game can also be picked-up in Berlin Steglitz.
